title: A Tennis Mom Plays Against Her Kids' Favorite Player
summary: Tatjana Maria is a tennis player from Germany. She played a match against Venus Williams, a famous American tennis star. Tatjana's two daughters, Charlotte and Cecilia, love Venus Williams. This made the match tough for Tatjana because her kids were cheering for her opponent. Tatjana won the match, and her daughter Charlotte was very excited to see Venus play. Tatjana and Venus are neighbors and know each other well. This match was special because both players are older, making it a record for the oldest combined age in women's tennis. Venus Williams has won many big tournaments in her career.
